projectGridLines.stationName: ZF India Technology Center - Use Cases - SDLC
projectGridLines.title: Use cases (multiple) in SW Development Life Cycle
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Assistance / Correction to the user on various Software issues & solutions

available (in the database already) and matching with existing problem statements. Many

areas where engineers spend lot of time to identify the root cause / spend time in analysis

– for already existing solutions. Fix might be already available in terms of code change,

which can also be suggested / change automatically to provide solution. There are

documents which are available to specify guidelines for reference.

Skill sets: Python, OOPS, PyTorch, Deep learning, GenAI, NLP

Traits expectation: Good analytical skills, suggest possible solutions and implement

Expected learning: AI Solutions to the developers / Testers in the life cycle of Embedded

Software development

Specific courses required for project execution: Data structure & algorithms, Artificial

Intelligence, Software engineering, Distributed computing (optional).
